title: Game Freezes PC
body: Since the update every time i get into a game, the game starts making a crackling noise then about 1-2mins in the game freezes my whole computer and i have to restart it, this doesn't happen with Csgo and overwatch so its the client. Also got me 20min q's FeelsBadMan. Can anyone help or do i have to re-install :(

replies.body: i have the same thing happening to me and i've tried both a repair and re-install and nothing is working.
Try doing a client repair first. If that doesn't work you prob should re-install the client.
